additionalInformation: The item grants the following bonuses: 1400 health and 7 health regeneration to strength heroes. 70 attack speed and 11.67 main armor to agility heroes. 840 mana and 3.5 mana regeneration to intelligence heroes. 70 main attack damage to / / all heroes
